IL6{serum}.name: Interleukin-6 in serum
IL6{serum}.description: Interleukin-6 cytokine in blood circulation; elevated in Crohn's disease

IL6{gut}.name: Interleukin-6 in gut
IL6{gut}.description: Interleukin-6 in gut compartment; significantly increased in intestinal mucosa in Crohn's

R.name: Membrane-bound IL-6 receptor
R.description: Membrane-bound IL-6 receptor (IL-6Rα); binds IL-6 for classical signaling

sR{serum}.name: Soluble IL-6 receptor in serum
sR{serum}.description: Soluble IL-6 receptor in blood; enables trans-signaling

sR{liver}.name: Soluble IL-6 receptor in liver
sR{liver}.description: Soluble IL-6 receptor in liver compartment

sR{gut}.name: Soluble IL-6 receptor in gut
sR{gut}.description: Soluble IL-6 receptor in gut compartment

gp130{liver}.name: Glycoprotein 130 in liver
gp130{liver}.description: Membrane-bound glycoprotein 130 co-receptor in liver cells

gp130{gut}.name: Glycoprotein 130 in gut
gp130{gut}.description: Membrane-bound glycoprotein 130 co-receptor in gut cells

sgp130{serum}.name: Soluble glycoprotein 130 in serum
sgp130{serum}.description: Soluble glycoprotein 130 in blood; natural inhibitor of IL-6 trans-signaling

R_IL6.name: IL-6/IL-6Rα complex
R_IL6.description: Complex of membrane-bound IL-6 receptor with IL-6

sR_IL6{serum}.name: IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in serum
sR_IL6{serum}.description: Complex of soluble IL-6 receptor with IL-6 in blood

sR_IL6{liver}.name: IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in liver
sR_IL6{liver}.description: Complex of soluble IL-6 receptor with IL-6 in liver

sR_IL6{gut}.name: IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in gut
sR_IL6{gut}.description: Complex of soluble IL-6 receptor with IL-6 in gut

R_IL6_gp130{liver}.name: IL-6/IL-6Rα/gp130 complex in liver
R_IL6_gp130{liver}.description: Tripartite complex of IL-6, IL-6Rα, and gp130 in liver

R_IL6_gp130{gut}.name: IL-6/IL-6Rα/gp130 complex in gut
R_IL6_gp130{gut}.description: Tripartite complex of IL-6, IL-6Rα, and gp130 in gut

sR_IL6_sgp130{serum}.name: IL-6/sIL-6Rα/sgp130 complex in serum
sR_IL6_sgp130{serum}.description: Inhibitory complex of IL-6, soluble IL-6 receptor, and sgp130 in blood

Ractive{liver}.name: Activated IL-6 receptor complex in liver
Ractive{liver}.description: Activated IL-6 receptor complex in liver cells

Ractive{gut}.name: Activated IL-6 receptor complex in gut
Ractive{gut}.description: Activated IL-6 receptor complex in gut cells

STAT3{liver}.name: STAT3 in liver
STAT3{liver}.description: Signal transducer and activator of transcription 3 in liver cells

pSTAT3{liver}.name: Phosphorylated STAT3 in liver
pSTAT3{liver}.description: Phosphorylated STAT3 in liver cells; indicates active IL-6 signaling

pSTAT3{gut}.name: Phosphorylated STAT3 in gut
pSTAT3{gut}.description: Phosphorylated STAT3 in gut cells; elevated in Crohn's disease

CRP{liver}.name: C-reactive protein in liver
CRP{liver}.description: C-reactive protein produced within liver cells

CRP{serum}.name: C-reactive protein in serum
CRP{serum}.description: C-reactive protein in blood; key inflammatory biomarker in Crohn's

CRPExtracellular.name: Extracellular C-reactive protein
CRPExtracellular.description: Secreted CRP not yet in circulation

geneProduct.name: STAT3-induced gene product
geneProduct.description: Generic product of genes activated by pSTAT3 signaling

Ab{serum}.name: Therapeutic antibody in serum
Ab{serum}.description: Therapeutic antibody (anti-IL6 or anti-IL6Rα) in blood

Ab_R.name: Antibody-receptor complex
Ab_R.description: Antibody bound to membrane-bound IL-6 receptor

Ab_sR{serum}.name: Antibody-sIL-6Rα complex in serum
Ab_sR{serum}.description: Antibody bound to soluble IL-6 receptor in blood

Ab_sR{liver}.name: Antibody-sIL-6Rα complex in liver
Ab_sR{liver}.description: Antibody bound to soluble IL-6 receptor in liver

Ab_sR{gut}.name: Antibody-sIL-6Rα complex in gut
Ab_sR{gut}.description: Antibody bound to soluble IL-6 receptor in gut

Ab_sR_IL6{serum}.name: Antibody-IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in serum
Ab_sR_IL6{serum}.description: Antibody bound to IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in blood

Ab_sR_IL6{liver}.name: Antibody-IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in liver
Ab_sR_IL6{liver}.description: Antibody bound to IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in liver

Ab_sR_IL6{gut}.name: Antibody-IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in gut
Ab_sR_IL6{gut}.description: Antibody bound to IL-6/sIL-6Rα complex in gut

CRP Suppression (%).name: CRP suppression percentage
CRP Suppression (%).description: Percentage reduction in CRP levels after treatment

CRP (% of baseline).name: CRP percentage of baseline
CRP (% of baseline).description: CRP levels as percentage of pre-treatment baseline
